name: Population Decrease
description:
Entering a strange new world, you find yourself face to face with a stranger clad in similar clothes to yourself, well now this just can't be! THIS TOWN AIN'T BIG ENOUGH FOR THE TWO OF YOU.

Challenge friends in an online 1v1 fps game for some chaotic fun as you find new ways to exploit the combat and seek tactical positioning or somehow find a way to speed across the entire map in seconds. This game was made for lync game jam and as such was created in a limited amount of time so expect the bugs or exploit them. This game is intended to be played with 2 players however it can be played with more (but is not intended to be or designed to be). In addition, for testing it can also be played using two tabs of the same game and simply switching between them. Lastly when creating a game and joining it, make sure the code isn't empty and keep in mind that the code is cap sensitive (even though it may not look like it)

Controls:

WASD: Basic movement

Space: Jump

Left Shift: Sprint

Left Click: Shoot

Disclaimer: Once the round ends and victor is determined then there's currently no way to reset/restart, so you'll have to reload the game and create a new lobby.
